comments: She is the sweetest lady. I took advertising with her and she is like a preschool teacher in the way she is with her students. There is a lot of little homework assignments in this class but they are all very easy. If you ask her for extra time on something or to submit it late she will let you.
Debra is a saint. Easy grader, a little boring but not a hard class to get an A.
Debora Brownstien is a great lady. Not the best in the world but very helpful if you talk with her. She means well and wants everyone to do well! I will defiantly take another class with her!

Looks for any reason to fail you. I had an A untill she decided to fail me on the final paper for "not doing a manditory part of the assignment." This "manditory step" was going to the writting center to have it edited.
